name: Parth Nagarkar
content: Parth Nagarkar I was an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science department at New Mexico State University from August 2017 to May 2023. I received my Ph.D. from Arizona State University under the supervision of Dr. K. Sel√ßuk Candan. My email address is nagarkar at nmsu dot edu My research interests are broadly in the exciting area of big data management. I am particularly interested in building scalable index structures and distributed systems which empower efficient large-scale, high-dimensional data processing. Data partner/sponsor: Polygon.io
